sentence.Network_en: Paul's apostleship is called into question; so he addresses this.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人怀疑保罗的 使徒 身分.因此保罗处理这问题.

sentence.Network_en: For you are the seal of my apostleship in the Lord.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为你们在主里正是我作使徒的印证.

auth_sentence.content: That group eventually grew into today's Apostleship of the Sea known internationally as Stella Maris.
